public.hero_subtitle: OpenArchive provides transparent access to public documents from local institutions in compliance with Romania's National Archives Law.
public.search_subtitle: Search through our collection of publicly available documents
public.features_subtitle: Discover how our public archive serves citizens and institutions
public.features_description: Our platform offers a comprehensive set of features designed to make document archiving and access simple and efficient.

features.search_desc: Find documents quickly with our powerful search tools including keyword and semantic search capabilities.
features.access_desc: Access publicly available documents instantly, with options to request access to restricted materials.
features.compliance_desc: All documents are managed in accordance with Romania's Law 16/1996 and the latest digital archiving norms.
features.preservation_desc: Documents are preserved in digital format ensuring long-term accessibility and historical record keeping.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform and services

questions.is_free: Is it free to use OpenArchive?
questions.what_documents: What types of documents can I find?
questions.how_to_search: How can I search for documents?
questions.request_access: How can I request access to a restricted document?
questions.access_denied: What if my access request is denied?
questions.response_time: How long does it take to process an access request?

answers.what_is_openarchive: OpenArchive is a digital archiving platform designed to help Romanian public institutions comply with Law 16/1996 (National Archives Law) and its 2023 digital norms. It provides tools for document capture, preservation, search, and lawful disclosure of official records.
answers.who_can_use: The platform is designed primarily for local public institutions in Romania. Different user roles include clerks for document upload, archivists for document management, citizens for public document access, and inspectors for audit purposes.
answers.is_free: Yes, access to public documents is free for all citizens. Public institutions may have costs associated with implementing and using the system.
answers.what_documents: You can find a variety of public documents including resolutions, administrative decisions, reports, local budgets, and other official documents issued by local public institutions.
answers.how_to_search: You can use the search function on our public portal to find publicly available documents. Enter keywords in the search box, and you can refine your search using filters for date range, document type, and institution.
answers.document_formats: The platform supports various file formats including PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, JPG, PNG, and TIFF. Documents are converted to PDF/A format for long-term preservation.
answers.request_access: For documents that are not publicly available, you can submit an access request through our portal, providing your details and the reason for your request.
answers.access_denied: If your request is denied, you will receive a notification with the reason. You can appeal the decision or submit a new request with additional information justifying access.
answers.response_time: Access requests are typically processed within 10 working days, in accordance with Romanian transparency laws. You will receive a notification when your request has been processed.

faq.contact_description: If you couldn't find the answer you were looking for, please contact us.

public.cta_subtitle: Login to request access to documents that aren't publicly available yet
public.cta_description: Some documents may be restricted due to privacy or security concerns. Registered users can request access to these documents through our secure system.
public.about_subtitle: Empowering transparency and access to public records
public.mission_description: OpenArchive is dedicated to providing transparent and efficient access to public documents from local institutions in compliance with Romania's National Archives Law (Law 16/1996) and its 2023 digital norms.
public.compliance_description: Our platform is built to ensure full compliance with Romanian archiving legislation while making public records accessible to citizens.
public.law_description: The National Archives Law of Romania establishes the legal framework for the creation, preservation, and access to public records.
public.law_note: The 2023 digital norms update to Law 16/1996 provides specific requirements for digital archiving that our platform fully implements.
public.about_feature_1_description: Secure long-term storage of digital documents with integrity verification
public.about_feature_2_description: Powerful search capabilities to quickly find the documents you need
public.about_feature_3_description: Clear processes for requesting access to restricted documents
public.about_feature_4_description: Full adherence to Romania's National Archives Law and digital norms
public.about_feature_5_description: Tools for institutions to manage their archiving obligations efficiently
public.about_feature_6_description: Empowering citizens with access to public information
public.faq_description: Find answers to common questions about our platform and services
public.faq_answer_1: OpenArchive is a digital archiving platform designed to help Romanian public institutions comply with Law 16/1996 (National Archives Law) and its 2023 digital norms. It provides tools for document capture, preservation, search, and lawful disclosure of official records.
public.faq_answer_2: The platform is designed primarily for local public institutions in Romania. Different user roles include clerks for document upload, archivists for document management, citizens for public document access, and inspectors for audit purposes.
public.faq_question_3: How do I search for documents?
public.faq_answer_3: You can use the search function on our public portal to find publicly available documents. Enter keywords in the search box, and you can also refine your search using filters for date range, document type, and institution.
public.faq_question_4: What if I can't find the document I'm looking for?
public.faq_answer_4: If you can't find a specific document, it may not be publicly available yet. You can submit an access request through our portal, providing your details and the reason for your request.
public.faq_question_5: How long does it take to process an access request?
public.faq_answer_5: Access requests are typically processed within 10 working days, in accordance with Romanian transparency laws. You will receive a notification when your request has been processed.
public.faq_answer_6: The platform supports various file formats including PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, JPG, PNG, and TIFF. Documents are converted to PDF/A format for long-term preservation.
public.faq_question_7: Is the platform compliant with Romanian law?
public.faq_answer_7: Yes, OpenArchive is designed to comply with Romania's Law 16/1996 (National Archives Law) and its 2023 digital norms, ensuring that all document management processes meet legal requirements.
public.faq_answer_8: The platform implements multiple security measures including encryption, access controls, audit logging, and integrity verification to ensure the security and authenticity of archived documents.
public.faq_answer_9: Yes, publicly available documents can be downloaded directly from the platform. For restricted documents, you need to submit an access request and receive approval.
public.faq_question_10: Who do I contact for technical support?
public.faq_answer_10: For technical support, please use the Contact form on our website. Our support team is available during regular business hours to assist with any issues.
public.contact_description: If you couldn't find the answer you were looking for, please contact us.
public.contact_subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Please fill out the form below or use our contact information.
public.contact_form_subtitle: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
public.contact_form_success_message: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you shortly.
public.contact_find_us_description: Our office is located in the heart of Bucharest.
